page.title: 11Andoversford - Resident F(2)
page.content: The closure of the Andoversford railway ststion took a long time for people in Andoversford to get used to.There were two railway stations-one was The Great Western Railway(GWR)and the other was The Midland Railway(MR).She travelled by train to Cheltenham(6p return)-quite a lot.When the railway line and station closed she came back on the last train.It was decorated with garlands of flowers and parties were held. She came to Andoversford because her Mum and Dad were poorly.They used to go to town on a horse drawn carriage to go shopping. When televisions were invented she used to have a type of earphone called a crystal set.
